name: Sporethroat Exalter
description: A vessel for ranged invocation, the Exalter exhales clouds thick with purpose. Its lungs, restructured into fungal resonance chambers, pour living breath into distant places where blades cannot tread.
abilities: Spore Burst: When this model is activated, choose a point within 8". All models within 3" of that point must make a Resolve test. Models that fail suffer -1 to their Movement until the end of the round.
Fungal Exaltation: This model can use its action to perform a Resolve test. If successful, all friendly THORNBOUND CHOIR models within 6" gain +1 to their Movement until the end of the round.
